verse.text: AlHamo_du lil~hi Al~*y >aHo_yAnA baEo_da mA >amAta_nA wa<ilyh Aln~u_$wr

lA <ilha <ilA~ All~hu waHo_dahu lA $a_ryka lh lhu Almul_ku wlhu AlHam_d whwa ElY kl~ $y'K qdyr su_boHAna Allhi wAlHmo_du llh wlA <ilha <ilA~ Allhu wAllhu >akbar walA Hawla walA qw~p <ilA~ bAll~hi AlEly~ AlEZym
AlHmdu llhi Al*y EAfAny fy jasady warad~ Ealy~ rwHy wa>a*ina ly bi*ikorih
AlHmdu llhi Al~*y kasAny h*A (Alv~wb) warazaqanyh mino ga_y_ori HawlK min~y walA q_w~p
All~hu_m~a la_ka AlHa_mo_du >no_ta kasa_wotanyhi >aaso>aalu_ka mi_no xa_yrihi waxa_yori maA SuniEa la_h wa>aEw*u bika mi_no $a_r~ihi wa$a_r~i m_A SuniEa la_hu

bisomi All~`h
(bisomi All~`h) All~hu_m~a <in~i_y >aE_w*u bi_ka mi_na Aloxu_bovi waAloxabA}iv
bisomi All~`h
>a$ohadu >ano lA <ila_ha <ilA~ Allhu waHodahu lA $ary_ka la_hu wa>a$ohadu >an~a muHam~_dAF Eabo_duhu waras_wlu_h

suboH_Anaka All~hu_m~a wabiHamdik >a$oha_du >ano lA <ilha <ilA~ >anota >asotagofiruka wa>atwbu <ila_yok
bisomi Allhi tawak~alo_tu EalY Allhi walA Hawola walA qu_w~apa <ilA~ biAllh
All~hu_m~a <in~i_y >aE_w*u bika >ano >aDi_l~a >awo >uDa_l >awo >azil~a >awo >uzal >awo >aZoli_ma >awo >auZola_m >awo >ajohala >awo yu_johala Eala_y~

All~hu_m~a AjoEa_lo fy qalob_y nwrA wafy lis_Any nwrA waAjoEa_lo fy samoEy nwrA waAjoEa_lo fy baSary nwrA waAjoEa_lo mino xalofy nwrA wamino >amAm_y nwrA waAjoEa_lo mino fawoq_y nwrA wamin taHot_y nwrA All~hu_m~a >aEoTin_y nwrA
>aEw*u bAllhi AlEaZy_m wabiwajohi_hi Alkariy_m wasuloT_Anih Alqady_m mina Al$~yo_TAni Alr~aj_ym biso_mi Allh waAlS~alApu waAls~alAmu EalY raswli Allh All~hu_m~a Afota_Ho ly >abowAba raHomat_ik
bismi Allh waAlS~lApu waAls~lAmu EalY raswli Allh All~hu_m~a <in~_y >aso>aluka mi_no faDo_lik All~hu_m~a AESimon_y mina Al$~ayo_TAni Alr~aj_ym

verse.title: PurificationOfTheSoul
verse.text: All~`hum~a |ti nafosiy taqowaAhaA wazak~ihaA >anota xayoru mano zak~aAhaA >anota waliy~uhaA wamawolaAhaA

verse.title: AfterCallToPrayerFirstPart
verse.text: All~`hum~a rab~a ha*hi AldEwapi AltAm~ap waAlSalaApi AlqaAi}map

verse.title: AfterCallToPrayerSecondPart
verse.text: |ti muHam~adAF Alwasiylapa waAlfaDiylap

verse.title: AfterCallToPrayerThirdPart
verse.text: waAbEvhu maqAmAF maHmuwdAF Al~a*iy wEdtha

verse.title: CallToPrayerFirstVerse
verse.text: All~`hu >akbar

verse.title: CallToPrayerSecondVerse
verse.text: >a$hadu >an laA <ilaha <il~aA All~`h

verse.title: CallToPrayerThirdVerse
verse.text: >a$hadu >an muHam~adAN rasuwl All~`h

verse.title: CallToPrayerFourthVerse
verse.text: Hay~a ElY AlSalAp

verse.title: CallToPrayerFifthVerse
verse.text: Hay~a ElY AlfalAH

verse.title: CallToPrayerSixthVerse
verse.text: AlS~alAp xayrN mina Aln~awm

verse.title: CallToPrayerSeventhVerse
verse.text: All~`hu >akbar

verse.title: CallToPrayerEighthVerse
verse.text: laA <ilaha <il~aA All~`h

verse.title: CallToBeginPrayerSixthVerse
verse.text: qad qaAmati AlSalAp

verse.title: FirstCreed
verse.text: l| <ilaha <il~aA All~`hu muHam~adN rasuwul All~`hi

verse.title: SecondCreed
verse.text: A$ohadu Ano l| <ilaha <il~aA All~`hu waHodah laA $ariyoka lah waAa$ohadu Aan~a muHam~adF AEaboduh warasuwluh

verse.title: ThirdCreed
verse.text: suboHaAn lil~`h waAloHamodu lil~`hi wal| <ilaha <il~aA All~`hu waAll~`hu Aakobaru walaA Hawola walAa quw~ap <il~aA biAll~`hi AloEaliY~ AloEaZiyom

verse.title: FourthCreed
verse.text: l| <ilaha <il~aA All~`hu waHodahu laA $ariyoka laho lahu Alomuloku walahu AloHamodu yuHoY wayumiyotu wahuwa HaY~u l~aA yamuwotu AabadFA AabadFA *uw AlojalaAli waAloAikoraAmi biyadihi Aloxayoru wahuwa EalY kul~i $a}KA qadiyorN

verse.title: FifthCreed
verse.text: Asotagofiru All~`ha rab~iYo mino kul~i *anobK Aa*onabotuh EamadFA Aawo xaTaAF sir~FA Aawo EalaAniyapF waAatuwobu Ailayohi mino Al*~anobi Al~a*iYo AaEolamu wamino Al*~anobi Al~a*iYo laA AaEolamu Ain~aka Aanota Eal~aAmu Alguyubi wasat~aAru AloEuyuwobi wagaf~aAru Al*~unuwobi walaA Hawola walaA quw~apa <il~aA biAll~`hi AloEaliY~i AlEaZiyom

verse.title: SixthCreed
verse.text: All~`hum~a Ain~Yo AaEuwodu bika mino Ano Au$orika $a}FA waAanaA AaEolamu bih waAsotagofiruka limaA laA AaEolamu bih tubotu Eanohu watabar~aAotu mina Alokufori waAl$~roki waAloki*obi waAlogiyobapi waAlobidoEapi waAln~amiyomapi waAlofawaAHi$i waAlobuhotaAni waAlomaEaASiYo kul~ihaA waAasolamotu waAaquwolu l| Ailha <il~aA All~`hu muHam~adu r~asuwolu All~`hi

verse.title: BeforeTravel
verse.text: >asotawodiEuka All~`ha diyonaka wa>amaA nataka waxawaAtima Eamalika.

verse.title: IntentionForJourneyShower
verse.text: nawayotu Alofusla lils~afari sun~apF lil~`hi taEaAlaY

verse.title: IntentionForIhramShower
verse.text: nawayotu Alofusla sun~apa Aol<iHoraAmi lil~`hi taEaAlaY

verse.title: IntentionForJourneyPrayer
verse.text: >uSal~iY sun~apa Als~afari rakoEatayoni lil~`hi taEaAlaY

verse.title: IntentionForIhramPrayer
verse.text: >uSal~iY sun~apa Aol<iHoraAmi rakoEatayoni lil~`hi taEaAlaY

verse.title: IhramPrayerSupplication
verse.text: bisomi All~`hi Alr~aHomani Alr~aHiyomi. All~`hu >akobaru, All~`hu >akobaru, All~`hu >akobaru, subHaAna Al~a*iyo sax~arAanaA ha*aA wamaA kun~aA lahu muqoriniyona. wa<in~aA <ilaY rab~inaA lamunoqalibuwona. All~`hum~a <in~aA naso>aluka fiY safarinaA ha*aA Alobir~a waAltaqowaY wamina AloEamali maA taroDiY. All~`hum~a huw~ino EaliyonaA safaranaA ha*aA wa>aTowi Ean~aA buEodapu. All~`hum~a >anota AlS~aAHibu fiY Als~afari waAloxaliyofatu fiY Al>aholi All~`hum~a <in~iy >aEuwo*ubika mino waEovaA'i Als~afari wakaAbati AlomanoZari wasuwo'i Alomunoqalabi fiY AlomaAli waAl>aholi.

verse.title: IntentionToPerformUmrah
verse.text: nawayotu AloEumorata wa>aHoramotu bihaA lil~`hi taEaAlaY.

verse.title: Talbiah
verse.text: lab~ayoka All~`hum~a lab~ayoka, lab~ayoka laA $ariyoka laka lab~ayoka, <in~a AloHamoda waAln~iEomata laka waAlomuloka, laA $ariyoka laka.

verse.title: SalawatSupplicationAfterTalbiah
verse.text: All~`hum~a Sal~i EalaY say~idinaA muHam~adK waEalaY >ali say~idinaA muHam~adK. kama Sal~ayota EalaY <iborahiyomi waEalaY >ali <iborahiyomi. wabaAriko EalaY say~idinaA muHam~adK waEalaY >ali say~idinaA muHam~ad kamaA baArakota EalaY <iborahiyoma waEalaY >ali <iborahiyoma, fiY AloEaAlamiyona <in~aka HamiyodN majiyodN.

verse.title: SupplicationAfterSalawatSupplication
verse.text: All~`hum~a <in~iy >aso>aluka riDaAka waAlojan~ata, wa>aEuwo*ubika mino saxaTika waAlnA~ari.

verse.title: SupplicationForArrivingAtMakkah
verse.text: All~`hum~a <in~a ha*aA AloHaraAma Haramuka, waAlobalada baladuka walAl>amona >amanuka, faHar~imoniy EalaY Aln~aAri wa>amin~ay mino Ea*aAbika yawoma taboEa$u EibaAdaka.

verse.title: EnteringMasjidilHaram
verse.text: All~`hum~a >anota Als~ala|mu waminoka Als~ala|mu faHay~inaA rab~anaA biAls~ala|mi wa>adoxilonaA Alojan~ata daAra Als~ala|mi tabaArakota rab~anaA wataEaAlayota yaA *aAAloxalAali waAlo<ikoraAmi. All~`hum~a AfotaHo liyo >abowaAba raHomatka wamagoofiratika wa>adoxiloniyo fiyohaA, bisomi All~`h waAloHamodu lil~`hi waAlS~alAatu waAls~ala|mu EalaY rasuwoli All~`hi Sal~aY All~`hu Ealayopi wasal~ama.

verse.title: Introduction
verse.text: nas>aluka yaA man huwa All~`hu Al~a*iy laA <ilaha <il~aA huwa

verse.title: Final1
verse.text: Al~a*iy laysa kamivlihi $ayN' wahuwa Als~amiyE AlbaSiyr

verse.title: Final2
verse.text: All~`hum~a Sal~iY AfDal~a S~alApi EalaY AsEadi maxluwqaAtika sayidinaA muHam~adi

verse.title: Final3
verse.text: wasal~im Eadada maEluwmaAtika wamidaAda kalimaAtika kul~amaA *akaraka Al*~aAkiruwna wagafala Ean *ikriki AlgaAfiluwn

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonFirst
verse.text: TalaE Albadru EalaynaA

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonSecond
verse.text: min vaniy~aAti AlwadaAE

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonThird
verse.text: wajab Al$ukru EalaynaA

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonFourth
verse.text: maA daEaY lil~`hi daAE

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonFifth
verse.text: >ay~uhaA AlmabEuwvu fiynaA

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonSixth
verse.text: ji}ta biAl>amri AlmuTaAE

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonSeventh
verse.text: ji}ta $ar~afta Almadiynap

verse.title: TheWhiteMoonEighth
verse.text: marHabFA yaA xayra daAE

verse.title: OMasterSendPrayersAndPeace
verse.text: mawlaAya Sal~iy wasal~im daAi}mFA >abadFA EalaY Habiybika xayri Alxulqi kul~ihimi

verse.title: RemembranceFirst
verse.text: laA <ilaha <il~aA >anta subHaAnikaY <in~iy kuntu min AlZaAlimiyn

verse.title: RemembranceSecond
verse.text: HasbNA All~`hu waniEm Alwakiyl, niEm AlmawlaY waniEm Alnasiyr

verse.title: RemembranceThird
verse.text: laA hawla walaA quwapK <il~aA bill~`hi AlEaliY~i AlEaZiym

verse.title: SendBlessingsFirst
verse.text: All~`hum~a Sal~i EalaY muHam~adK waEalaY |li muHam~adK kamaA Sal~ayota EalaY <iboraAhiyma waEalaY |li <iboraAhiyma <in~aka HamiydN majiydN wabaAriko EalaY muHam~adK waEalaY |li muHam~adK kamaA baArakota EalaY <iboraAhiyma waEalaY |li <iboraAhiyma fiy AloEaAlamiyna <in~aka HamiydN majiydN

verse.title: SendBlessingsSecond
verse.text: All~`hum~a Sal~i EalaY muHam~adK waEalaY |li muHam~adK kamaA Sal~ayota EalaY <iboraAhiyma waEalaY |li <iboraAhiyma <ina~ka HamiydN majiydN Alla~huma~ baAriko EalaY muHama~dK waEalaY |li muHama~dK kamaA baArakota EalaY <iboraAhiyma waEalaY |li <iboraAhiyma <ina~ka HamiydN majiydN

>abuw Eabaydap EaAmir bin Eabdi All`h bin >aljar~aAH‎
